[ Learn skills ]

Congreatulation! Eou are 5 lvl now.
Now you can learn skills. You can do it with NPC in dwarven village in blacksmith shop. Follow the indicator under your head.
To recieve the skills you must have some SP?SP Increases every time, when you are hunting. Kill more monsters to resieve more SP.
If you whant to know, how much SP do you have now, pressAlt+T.

Close window.
